source_objects.title: Management
source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.

items.title: Estimation of Measurement Uncertainty
items.headline: Uncertainty in Measurement
objectives_summary: How to estimate uncertainty in measurement
Type A and Type B factors in uncertainty estimation

items.title: Business Operation & Supply Chain Management Training Course
items.headline: Acquire business operations & supply chain management skills for successful business processes with this training course
objectives_summary: Grab the opportunity to step into a position of leadership
Be able to make strategic decision and can plan a workable logistics strategy
Understand your role in Business Development and Succession Planning

items.title: How To Maximize Your First Two Years As A New Supervisor
items.headline: Laying A Solid Leadership Foundation
objectives_summary: How to make more money. Once we cut through the fluff, clichés and buzz words, we accept a position of leadership to make more money for our family. That's why we uproot families, pull kid from their schools and move across the state or country.  In order for this to occur, we MUST make more money for our company. This is accomplished by closing the gap between your performance and potential as quickly as possible and improving results. Successful companies reward results, NOT tenure.
Start the foundation for a successful and profitable career in Leadership.

items.title: Leadership in Kata Style
items.headline: Modern leadership concepts for highly innovative teams
objectives_summary: Leadership concepts for creating highly innovative teams
Boost the motivation, passion and joy at work
Create superior results by developing people

Prepare for the CIPS L5M2 Managing Supply Risk Exams

items.title: Leadership development for Inquisitive Minds
items.headline: Leadership adaptation and attributes
objectives_summary: What is corporate leadership
What are true attributes of a leader
What to expect when you become a leader

items.title: Team Building - Hands-on Tools To Build A Cohesive Team

visible_instructors.name: Eli
visible_instructors.title: Eli Harari
visible_instructors.job_title: The Thinking Coach - Leadership Training of a Different Kind

items.headline: A must for Team & Business leaders. This is the best ROI & a powerful strategy to build a cohesive leadership team
objectives_summary: Learn how to build and manage a true team through core fundamentals of Team Building
Learn to build trust among your team members - trust that will thrust you & your team forward
Learn how to handle conflict and have ideological conflicts that build a team - not destroy it!

items.title: Creative Thinking Simplified

visible_instructors.name: Koundinya
visible_instructors.title: Koundinya Nemana (Edushore)
visible_instructors.job_title: Expert trainer for Lean | Lean Six Sigma | Creative Thinking

items.headline: Discover new ways to develop out-of-the-box thinking, stand-out from the crowd, and make a difference to your career!
objectives_summary: How to condition your mind to think in new and unconventional ways
Definitions, demonstrations, and exercises of various creative thinking techniques
The traps and hurdles for creative thinking

items.title: Lean System Thinking in Manufacturing
items.headline: Learn to reduce your operational cost & lead time using a holistic lean system thinking,tools and techniques
objectives_summary: You will learn the basic understanding about Lean , Lean Manufacturing and Lean System Thinking in Manufacturing environment
You will learn how the cost of product and lead time can be reduced by the application of  lean system thinking
You will learn to identify the waste in the manufacturing environment and its impact on cost and leadtime.

items.title: Small Business Marketing and Business Plan Essentials
items.headline: Understand the Importance of a Business Plan - Establish a Marketing Plan - Get Organized
objectives_summary: Understand the Importance of a Business Plan
Know the Structure of a Business Plan
Create a Business Plan

items.title: Six Sigma White Belt - Learn 6σ by Self Assessment & Exam

visible_instructors.name: Exoexcellence
visible_instructors.title: Exoexcellence Training Resources
visible_instructors.job_title: Management System, Process Excellence, Lean & Six Sigma

items.headline: MCQs on various aspects of six sigma methodology from various roles to DMAIC, DMADV & towards the basics of 6σ tools
objectives_summary: Students will be assessed on six sigma white belt knowledge
Questions will be based on DMAIC processs
Questions will be based on DMADV processs

items.title: Leadership and Change

visible_instructors.name: Pilar
visible_instructors.title: Pilar Orti
visible_instructors.job_title: Management and Leadership Training for Virtual Teams

items.headline: Deal with resistance, coach your team and thrive through those difficult transitions.
objectives_summary: An overview of the different challenges you're likely to encounter during change.
Behaviors to look out for in both your team and yourself that will block your change efforts.
Communication strategies to ensure your team members stay on the change path with you.

items.title: Equality, diversity and inclusion
items.headline: How to tackle and avoid discrimination
objectives_summary: Be better equipped to tackle the complex and sensitive issues relating to discrimination
Appreciate the harm that discrimination can do, even when unintentional
Be clear about what the terms equality, diversity and inclusion mean and appreciate why they are important

items.title: Kano Analysis to Prioritize Customer Needs and Expectations

visible_instructors.name: Sandeep Kumar
visible_instructors.title: Sandeep Kumar ­
visible_instructors.job_title: Experienced Quality Director • Six Sigma Coach • Consultant

items.headline: Understand Kano Model and get the tools/templates required to do a detailed analysis
objectives_summary: Using Kano Model, you will be able to understand the customer needs and expectations
You will be able to prioritize customer needs that will lead to higher customer satisfaction or lower dissatisfaction
This course goes beyond basic theory and provides you with the tools (Microsoft Excel template provided) to conduct Kano Analysis at a bigger scale.

items.title: IATF 16949:2016 Clauses Awareness Training
items.headline: Guidelines for automotive supply chain manufacturing units
objectives_summary: Those working in automotive supply chain at supervisory and /or managerial level
